bill_title: set certain property tax levies and to provide for their application.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to set certain property tax levies and to provide for their application. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The levies specified in § 10-12-42 for ad valorem taxes paid in calendar year 2011 are the same as the levies for ad valorem taxes paid in calendar year 2010. Notwithstanding any other provisions of law, the provisions of §§ 13-13-71, 13-13-72, and 13-13-72.1 do not apply to the levies specified in § 10-12-42 for ad valorem taxes paid in calendar year 2011. Section 2. For the purposes of §§ 13-13-71, 13-13-72, and 13-13-72.1, the relationship between statewide local effort as a percentage of statewide local need defined in § 13-13-72 is the relationship as established in section 1 of this Act. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
